amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to develop a space-based ballistic missile intercept layer.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 24 printed in House Report 115-785 to prohibit the use of funds to develop a space-based ballistic missile intercept layer.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 251 (Roll no. 310).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A033) offered by Mr. Foster.
